```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(lubridate)

mon <- as_date("2024-01-15")
tues <- mon+days(1)

advdate <- function(day, week) {
  date <- (day + weeks(week))
  dm <- paste(month(date, label = TRUE)," ", day(date))
  return(dm)  
}
```
